body: The thing is, our MC isn't even the usual stupid cuck, he even knows who's she's been with. It's just as the bastard stated. She's so easy she even immediately believe the word of some stranger rather her own boyfriend.

ima give better context. 
Gf and bf are happy, random ntr man wants girl for himself. Bf tells her the man is suspicious multiple times and to stay away from him, gf kinda listens but not really. Gf is heartbroken that she didn't believe bf. Ntr man hits the slip stream and nuts inside before letting her go. Gf was ovulating so welcome to motherhood?
